mapper.select: select product.id,product.name,product.sellerId,product.size,product.price,product.stock,product.sold,product.desc,product.img, (select p_type.name from p_type where p_type.id=p_attr.typeId) as type, p_attr.push_level,p_attr.discount,p_attr.dprice,p_attr.tag,p_attr.create_at,p_attr.update_at from product left join p_attr on product.id=p_attr.pid where product.id=#{id}

select product.id,product.name,product.sellerId,product.size,product.price,product.stock,product.sold,product.desc,product.img, (select p_type.name from p_type where p_type.id=p_attr.typeId) as type, p_attr.push_level,p_attr.discount,p_attr.dprice,p_attr.tag,p_attr.create_at,p_attr.update_at from product left join p_attr on product.id=p_attr.pid order by update_at desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select product.id,product.name,product.sellerId,product.size,product.price,product.stock,product.sold,product.desc,product.img, (select p_type.name from p_type where p_type.id=p_attr.typeId) as type, p_attr.push_level,p_attr.discount,p_attr.dprice,p_attr.tag,p_attr.create_at,p_attr.update_at from product left join p_attr on product.id=p_attr.pid where product.name like "%"#{name}"%" order by update_at desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(id) from product WHERE name like "%"#{name}"%"
